Game.Name: Crash Bandicoot Purple - Ripto's Rampage (USA) (Rev 1)
Game.plot: Gameplay: Crash Bandicoot and Spyro the Dragon travels across five different worlds to stop Cortex and Ripto. In this version of the game, Crash does this by collecting crystals. Gameplay is similar to previous Crash games in that Crash must get from the start of the stage to the end. There are also several minigames to beat. Story:Crash Bandicoot's nemesis Doctor N. Cortex and Spyro's most prolific enemy Ripto decide to team up so they can take over the world. Part of this plan involves setting Spyro after Crash by disguising Ripto's minions as Crash. While this works at first, the two heroes eventually wise up to the scheme, teaming up themselves to stop the villains. This version centers around Crash Bandicoot; the Spyro Orange version centers around Spyro.
Game.Notes: In Crash Bandicoot Purple: Ripto's Rampage and Spyro Orange: The Cortex Conspiracy, Dr. Neo Cortex--Crash's nemesis--and Ripto--Spyro's nemesis--have accidentally met up through underground portals and are set on taking over the entire universe. Crash and Spyro must team up with each other to discover the identity of the new menace and save the universe from this evil plot. In these side-scrolling adventures, you can link up with three friends for a variety of multiplayer modes, including Party Games, Wager Games, and Card Trading. Connecting both Crash Bandicoot Purple and Spyro Orange gives you the option of unlocking special content and allows you to trade and wager the cards with friends.
